title: Baby Celery And Shitake Mushroom Salad With Lemon And Parmigian
summary: Need a gluten free and primal side dish? Baby Celery And Shitake Mushroom Salad With Lemon And Parmigian could be a super recipe to try. This recipe makes 1 servings with 805 calories, 6g of protein, and 84g of fat each. For $2.61 per serving, this recipe covers 26% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. Not a lot of people made this recipe, and 1 would say it hit the spot. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. If you have salt, parmigiano-reggiano, squeezed lemon juice, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. It is brought to you by SippitySup. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 86%. This score is excellent. Try Baby Celery and Shitake Mushroom Salad with Lemon and Parmigiano-Reggiano, Stir Fry Baby Bok Choy With Shitake Mushroom Recipe, and Shitake Mushroom Salad Recipe for similar recipes.
